text:
Dear Uh-GAF Physiotherapy Students,
Wishing you a prosperous and successful Academic Year.
To ensure a smooth start to your studies, please note that textbooks can be collected from the bookstore (K-0.10) every Thursdaybetween 9:30 AM and 1:00 PMonly.
We kindly ask that you adhereto this schedule, as no exceptions will be made.
Don't forget to bring your GAF ID üôÇ.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Best Wishes,
UH-GAF Library Team
